Styling

Colors

All color variables should be prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

1.4.1. Use of Color - Color is not used as the only visual means of conveying information, indicating an action, prompting a response, or distinguishing a visual element. (Level A)

1.4.3 Contrast (Minimum) - The visual presentation of text and images of text has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, except for [exceptions]. (Level AA)

Primary

$color-cherry
#e00000
$color-ruby
#a51323
$color-sea-glass
#7fffd4
$color-grass
#3cf73c
$color-cornflower
#4083ae
$color-navy
#0a3055
$color-eggplant
#550055

Black, White, Grays

$color-black
#000000
$color-midnight
#464646
$color-manatee
#888b8d
$color-silver
#bbbbbb
$color-alto
#dddddd
$color-gallery
#eeeeee
$color-alabaster
#f7f7f7
$color-white
#ffffff
